description: Works very well and easy to set up. Is intended for use in a classroom but also acts as a good remote desktop solution.
Master UI is OK but useless as Configurator is designed by geeks and only a geek can work out how to configure it so one can use the Master; Remmina is a far better app, easy to set up and to use.
Ayuda a controlar los entornos educativos y mejorar la efectividad de la información que se transmite, logrando la concentración de los participantes en los aspectos requeridos de forma puntual.
summary: Excelente aplicación, versátil y de gran utilidad
